content:
本件保存七年
C2-62- 1562
May 18, 2
MEMORANDUM
To
: Nr. N. L. Hirshberg Program Officer, US AID/G
From
: C. C. Chang Original signed by Chief, Second Division C. C. Chang
Subject : Exceas Equipment Project No. 1-99-AX (99-471)
Reference in made to the attached copy of 500 Letter 300-5108 dated May 12, 1962.
In the above letter, SoG requested that 30 Model 270 GMO engines be procured. If you concur and they are avail- able, please initiate necessary action for acquisition and shipment to Taiwan.
Enel. copy of $80 letter cc: SDG JGWhite (with copy of G00 letter) BIS ( 2 17 ## 20
( 1: N )
E-16.13. 2
國史饭 Acidemia Historica
